channel.title: FAIR on Dr. Mowinckel's
channel.description: Recent content in FAIR on Dr. Mowinckel's

item.title: Making your blog FAIR
item.description: Making your blog FAIR (Findable, Accessible, Interoperable, and Reusable) by archiving posts on Zenodo and adding DOIs. Learn how to use Hugo, GitHub actions, and the Zenodo API to ensure your content is preserved. Enhance your blog’s visibility and reliability.
